member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.Identity.IdentityGeneratorFilesConfig.GetViewImports(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.Identity.IdentityGeneratorFile},Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.IFileSystem,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of ViewImport template files based on the files to generate and also on which _ViewImports already exist in the project. We start from the innermost directory requested, if a _ViewImports file exists at this level, we are done. If not, we add one to be generated and then look in the outer directory. Sequence is: - Account.Manage._ViewImports - Account._ViewImports - _ViewImports
